column1: 353,"WN277","Software","On October 8th, 2015, shortly after version 3.13.0, [Locus](http://www.locusmap.eu/)  version [3.13.1](http://www.locusmap.eu/news-version-3-13.0/) has been released. May be a bug fix release."

column5: Fixed issue with unhided screen keyboard on registration view, waypoints from group tracks now visible on map.
Better deletion of sequences after upload.
The selection between the 3 route modes (fastest, curvy, extra curvy) has been moved to the route menu, avoiding ferries, highways, toll roads and smaller roads possible.
Add translations:  Albanian, Danish, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, simplified Chinese, Swedish and Turkish, sending crash reports,  bugfixes.

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://wambachers-osm.website/index.php/osm-software-watchlist). Timestamp: 2017-08-15 12:58:09+02 UTC

12025,"WN517","Software","Now [there](https://twitter.com/locusmap/status/1267823803784036355?s=19) is an [extension](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vastuf.lopoi) to [Locus](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Locus), the mobile navigator, which allows you to add and edit POI in OSM via this app."

13947,"WN559","Software","Michel, from the Locus team, [presented](https://www.locusmap.app/locus-map-4-is-here-enjoy-its-first-release/) 'Locus Map 4' as a brand new app that offers all the basic map functions for free."

14355,"WN570","Maps","[AnyGIS](https://anygis.ru/index_en) (as we reported [earlier](https://weeklyosm.eu/archives/14021#wn541_23903)) provides links to bulk download raster tiles from online maps for various apps. Not only is bulk downloading prohibited by some map providers, the maps packages provided by AnyGIS allow [Locus](https://www.locusmap.eu/) to do so by faking user-agent and referrer headers in the requests Locus sends to map providers."

18816,"WN699","Maps","[OpenHiking](https://www.openhiking.eu) offers optimised vector maps for hikers based on OpenStreetMap data. These maps highlight hiking routes and symbols, water sources, points of interest, and natural features. They include contour lines and shading and are compatible with Garmin devices as well as Android through apps including [OruxMaps](https://oruxmaps.com/) and [LocusMaps](https://www.locusmap.app/). The maps cover areas such as the Carpathians and the Alps and offer features such as routing and searching for geographical names (Garmin only) and regular updates."

20228,"WN731","Releases","Locus Map [highlighted](https://www.locusmap.app/de/spezialitaeten-aus-dem-locus-map-menue/) their app's hidden features such as automatic zoom, terrain shading, dynamic elevation display and audio coaching, demonstrating its versatility for activities such as walking, cycling and geocaching, and emphasising its usefulness for professionals and hobbyists alike."

20706,"WN742","Releases","Michal [announced](https://www.locusmap.app/new-locus-map-4-26-dynamic-offline-lomap-rotation-and-other-features-not-only-for-cyclists/) the release of Locus Map 4.26, which includes several enhancements, such as improvements to the rotating map feature, offline routing engine, remaining elevation estimation, and the Garmin smartwatch add-on."

21199,"WN754","Community","Jiří Eischmann [emphasised](https://social.vivaldi.net/@sesivany/113724617513228762) the function of #LocusMap that he really likes: ‘you can take a photo of a map, calibrate it with the standard map and then display it as an overlay’."

21192,"WN754","Software","Sesivany has [evaluated](https://blog.eischmann.cz/2025/01/01/mapy-cz-maji-predplatne-ale-seznam-uz-me-naucil-pouzivat-neco-jineho/) :CZ-s:>>>[:EN-t:](https://blog-eischmann-cz.translate.goog/2025/01/01/mapy-cz-maji-predplatne-ale-seznam-uz-me-naucil-pouzivat-neco-jineho/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=EN) the various OSM-based map applications for mobile phones: Mapy\.cz, OsmAnd, LocusMap, Organic Maps, and Freemap\.sk."
